   21: %%
   22: 
   23: -module(ssl_renegotiate_SUITE).
   24: 
   25: -behaviour(ct_suite).
   26: 
   27: -include("ssl_test_lib.hrl").
   28: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   29: -include_lib("public_key/include/public_key.hrl").
   30: -include("ssl_record.hrl").
   31: 
   32: %% Common test
   33: -export([all/0,
   34:          groups/0,
   35:          init_per_suite/1,
   36:          init_per_group/2,
   37:          init_per_testcase/2,
   38:          end_per_suite/1,
   39:          end_per_group/2,
   40:          end_per_testcase/2
   41:         ]).
   42: 
   43: %% Test cases
   44: -export([client_renegotiate/0,
   45:          client_renegotiate/1,
   46:          server_renegotiate/0,
   47:          server_renegotiate/1,
   48:          client_secure_renegotiate/0,
   49:          client_secure_renegotiate/1,
   50:          client_secure_renegotiate_fallback/0,
   51:          client_secure_renegotiate_fallback/1,
   52:          client_renegotiate_reused_session/0,
   53:          client_renegotiate_reused_session/1,
   54:          server_renegotiate_reused_session/0,
   55:          server_renegotiate_reused_session/1,
   56:          client_no_wrap_sequence_number/0,
   57:          client_no_wrap_sequence_number/1,
   58:          server_no_wrap_sequence_number/0,
   59:          server_no_wrap_sequence_number/1,
   60:          renegotiate_dos_mitigate_active/0,
   61:          renegotiate_dos_mitigate_active/1,
   62:          renegotiate_dos_mitigate_passive/0,
   63:          renegotiate_dos_mitigate_passive/1,
   64:          renegotiate_dos_mitigate_absolute/0,
   65:          renegotiate_dos_mitigate_absolute/1,
   66:          active_error_disallowed_client_renegotiate/0,
   67:          active_error_disallowed_client_renegotiate/1
   68:         ]).
   69: 
   70: %% Apply export
   71: -export([renegotiate/2,
   72:          renegotiate_reuse_session/2,
   73:          renegotiate_immediately/1,
   74:          renegotiate_rejected/1,
   75:          erlang_ssl_receive/2]).
   76: 
   77: -define(SLEEP, 500).
   78: -define(RENEGOTIATION_DISABLE_TIME, 12000).
   79: 
   80: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   81: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   82: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   83: all() -> 
   84:     [
   85:      {group, 'tlsv1.2'},
   86:      {group, 'tlsv1.1'},
   87:      {group, 'tlsv1'},
   88:      {group, 'dtlsv1.2'},
   89:      {group, 'dtlsv1'}
   90:     ].
   91: 
   92: groups() ->
   93:     [{'dtlsv1.2', [], renegotiate_tests()},
   94:      {'dtlsv1',   [], renegotiate_tests()},
   95:      {'tlsv1.2',  [], renegotiate_tests()},
   96:      {'tlsv1.1',  [], renegotiate_tests()},
   97:      {'tlsv1',    [], renegotiate_tests()}
   98:     ].
   99: 
  100: renegotiate_tests() ->
  101:     [client_renegotiate,
  102:      server_renegotiate,
  103:      client_secure_renegotiate,
  104:      client_secure_renegotiate_fallback,
  105:      client_renegotiate_reused_session,
  106:      server_renegotiate_reused_session,
  107:      client_no_wrap_sequence_number,
  108:      server_no_wrap_sequence_number,
  109:      renegotiate_dos_mitigate_active,
  110:      renegotiate_dos_mitigate_passive,
  111:      renegotiate_dos_mitigate_absolute,
  112:      active_error_disallowed_client_renegotiate].
  113: 
  114: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  115:     catch crypto:stop(),
  116:     try crypto:start() of
  117: 	ok ->
  118: 	    ssl_test_lib:clean_start(),
  119:             ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_cert(Config)
  120:     catch _:_ ->
  121: 	    {skip, "Crypto did not start"}
  122:     end.
  123: 
  124: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  125:     ssl:stop(),
  126:     application:stop(crypto).
  127: 
  128: init_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  129:     ssl_test_lib:init_per_group(GroupName, Config). 
  130: 
  131: end_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  132:   ssl_test_lib:end_per_group(GroupName, Config).
  133: 
  134: init_per_testcase(TestCase, Config)  when TestCase == renegotiate_dos_mitigate_active;
  135:                                           TestCase == renegotiate_dos_mitigate_passive;
  136:                                           TestCase == renegotiate_dos_mitigate_absolute ->
  137:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 160}),
  138:     Config;
  139: init_per_testcase(_, Config) ->
  140:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 15}),
  141:     Config.
  142: 
  143: end_per_testcase(_, Config) ->
  144:     Config.
  145: 
  146: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  147: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  148: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  149: client_renegotiate() ->
  150:     [{doc,"Test ssl:renegotiate/1 on client."}].
  151: client_renegotiate(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  152:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  153:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  154: 
  155:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  156: 
  157:     Data = "From erlang to erlang",
  158: 
  159:     Server =
  160: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  161: 				   {from, self()},
  162: 				   {mfa, {?MODULE, erlang_ssl_receive, [Data]}},
  163: 				   {options, ServerOpts}]),
  164:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  165: 
  166:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  167: 					{host, Hostname},
  168: 					{from, self()},
  169: 					{mfa, {?MODULE,
  170: 					       renegotiate, [Data]}},
  171: 					{options, [{reuse_sessions, false} | ClientOpts]}]),
  172:     
  173:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Client, ok, Server, ok),
  174:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  175:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  176: 
  177: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  178: client_secure_renegotiate() ->
  179:     [{doc,"Test ssl:renegotiate/1 on client."}].
  180: client_secure_renegotiate(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  181:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  182:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  183: 
  184:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  185: 
  186:     Data = "From erlang to erlang",
  187: 
  188:     Server =
  189: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  190: 				   {from, self()},
  191: 				   {mfa, {?MODULE, erlang_ssl_receive, [Data]}},
  192: 				   {options, [{secure_renegotiate, true} | ServerOpts]}]),
  193:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  194: 
  195:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  196: 					{host, Hostname},
  197: 					{from, self()},
  198: 					{mfa, {?MODULE,
  199: 					       renegotiate, [Data]}},
  200: 					{options, [{reuse_sessions, false},
  201: 						   {secure_renegotiate, true}| ClientOpts]}]),
  202:     
  203:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Client, ok, Server, ok),
  204:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  205:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  206: 
  207: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  208: client_secure_renegotiate_fallback() ->
  209:     [{doc,"Test that we can set secure_renegotiate to false that is "
  210:       "fallback option, we however do not have a insecure server to test against!"}].
  211: client_secure_renegotiate_fallback(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  212:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  213:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  214: 
  215:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  216: 
  217:     Data = "From erlang to erlang",
  218: 
  219:     Server =
  220: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  221: 				   {from, self()},
  222: 				   {mfa, {?MODULE, erlang_ssl_receive, [Data]}},
  223: 				   {options, [{secure_renegotiate, false} | ServerOpts]}]),
  224:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  225: 
  226:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  227: 					{host, Hostname},
  228: 					{from, self()},
  229: 					{mfa, {?MODULE,
  230: 					       renegotiate, [Data]}},
  231: 					{options, [{reuse_sessions, false},
  232: 						   {secure_renegotiate, false}| ClientOpts]}]),
  233:     
  234:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Client, ok, Server, ok),
  235:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  236:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  237: 
  238: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  239: server_renegotiate() ->
  240:     [{doc,"Test ssl:renegotiate/1 on server."}].
  241: server_renegotiate(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  242:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  243:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  244: 
  245:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  246: 
  247:     Data = "From erlang to erlang",
  248: 
  249:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
  250: 					{from, self()}, 
  251: 					{mfa, {?MODULE,
  252: 					       renegotiate, [Data]}},
  253: 					{options, ServerOpts}]),
  254:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  255: 
  256:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port}, 
  257: 					{host, Hostname},
  258: 					{from, self()},
  259: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, erlang_ssl_receive, [Data]}},
  260: 					{options, [{reuse_sessions, false} | ClientOpts]}]),
  261:     
  262:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  263:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  264:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  265: 
  266: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  267: client_renegotiate_reused_session() ->
  268:     [{doc,"Test ssl:renegotiate/1 on client when the ssl session will be reused."}].
  269: client_renegotiate_reused_session(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  270:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  271:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  272: 
  273:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  274: 
  275:     Data = "From erlang to erlang",
  276: 
  277:     Server =
  278: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  279: 				   {from, self()},
  280: 				   {mfa, {?MODULE, erlang_ssl_receive, [Data]}},
  281: 				   {options, ServerOpts}]),
  282:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  283: 
  284:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port}, 
  285: 					{host, Hostname},
  286: 					{from, self()},
  287: 					{mfa, {?MODULE,
  288: 					       renegotiate_reuse_session, [Data]}},
  289: 					{options, [{reuse_sessions, true} | ClientOpts]}]),
  290:     
  291:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Client, ok, Server, ok),
  292:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  293:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  294: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  295: server_renegotiate_reused_session() ->
  296:     [{doc,"Test ssl:renegotiate/1 on server when the ssl session will be reused."}].
  297: server_renegotiate_reused_session(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  298:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  299:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  300: 
  301:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  302:     
  303:     Data = "From erlang to erlang",
  304: 
  305:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  306: 					{from, self()},
  307: 					{mfa, {?MODULE,
  308: 					       renegotiate_reuse_session, [Data]}},
  309: 					{options, ServerOpts}]),
  310:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  311:     
  312:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  313: 					{host, Hostname},
  314: 					{from, self()},
  315: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, erlang_ssl_receive, [Data]}},
  316: 					{options, [{reuse_sessions, true} | ClientOpts]}]),
  317: 
  318:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  319:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  320:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  321: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  322: client_no_wrap_sequence_number() ->
  323:     [{doc,"Test that erlang client will renegotiate session when",
  324:      "max sequence number celing is about to be reached. Although"
  325:      "in the testcase we use the test option renegotiate_at"
  326:      " to lower treashold substantially."}].
  327: 
  328: client_no_wrap_sequence_number(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  329:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  330:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  331: 
  332:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  333: 
  334:     ErlData = "From erlang to erlang",
  335:     N = 12,
  336: 
  337:     Server =
  338: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  339: 				   {from, self()},
  340: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  341: 				   {options, ServerOpts}]),
  342:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  343: 
  344:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config, tuple),
  345: 
  346:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  347: 					{host, Hostname},
  348: 					{from, self()},
  349: 					{mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  350: 					       trigger_renegotiate, [[ErlData, treashold(N, Version)]]}},
  351: 					{options, [{reuse_sessions, false},
  352: 						   {renegotiate_at, N} | ClientOpts]}]),
  353: 
  354:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Client, ok),
  355:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  356:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  357: 
  358: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  359: server_no_wrap_sequence_number() ->
  360:     [{doc, "Test that erlang server will renegotiate session when",
  361:      "max sequence number celing is about to be reached. Although"
  362:      "in the testcase we use the test option renegotiate_at"
  363:      " to lower treashold substantially."}].
  364: 
  365: server_no_wrap_sequence_number(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  366:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  367:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  368: 
  369:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  370: 
  371:     Data = "From erlang to erlang",
  372:     N = 12,
  373: 
  374:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  375: 					{from, self()},
  376: 					{mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  377: 					       trigger_renegotiate, [[Data, N+2]]}},
  378: 					{options, [{renegotiate_at, N} | ServerOpts]}]),
  379:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  380: 
  381:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  382: 					{host, Hostname},
  383: 					{from, self()},
  384: 					{mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  385: 					{options, [{reuse_sessions, false} | ClientOpts]}]),
  386: 
  387:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok),
  388:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  389:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  390: renegotiate_dos_mitigate_active() ->
  391:     [{doc, "Mitigate DOS computational attack by not allowing client to renegotiate many times in a row",
  392:       "immediately after each other"}].
  393: renegotiate_dos_mitigate_active(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  394:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  395:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  396: 
  397:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  398: 
  399:     Server =
  400: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  401: 				   {from, self()},
  402: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  403: 				   {options, ServerOpts}]),
  404:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  405: 
  406:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  407: 					{host, Hostname},
  408: 					{from, self()},
  409: 					{mfa, {?MODULE,
  410: 					       renegotiate_immediately, []}},
  411: 					{options, ClientOpts}]),
  412: 
  413:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Client, ok, Server, ok),
  414:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  415:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  416: 
  417: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  418: renegotiate_dos_mitigate_passive() ->
  419:     [{doc, "Mitigate DOS computational attack by not allowing client to renegotiate many times in a row",
  420:       "immediately after each other"}].
  421: renegotiate_dos_mitigate_passive(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  422:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  423:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  424: 
  425:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  426: 
  427:     Server =
  428: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  429: 				   {from, self()},
  430: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result, []}},
  431: 				   {options, [{active, false} | ServerOpts]}]),
  432:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  433:  
  434:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  435: 					{host, Hostname},
  436: 					{from, self()}, 
  437: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, 
  438: 					       renegotiate_immediately, []}},
  439: 					{options, ClientOpts}]),
  440:     
  441:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Client, ok, Server, ok), 
  442:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  443:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  444: 
  445: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  446: renegotiate_dos_mitigate_absolute() ->
  447:     [{doc, "Mitigate DOS computational attack by not allowing client to initiate renegotiation"}].
  448: renegotiate_dos_mitigate_absolute(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  449:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  450:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  451: 
  452:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  453: 
  454:     Server =
  455: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  456: 				   {from, self()},
  457: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  458: 				   {options, [{client_renegotiation, false} | ServerOpts]}]),
  459:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  460: 
  461:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  462: 					{host, Hostname},
  463: 					{from, self()},
  464: 					{mfa, {?MODULE,
  465: 					       renegotiate_rejected,
  466: 					       []}},
  467: 					{options, ClientOpts}]),
  468: 
  469:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Client, ok, Server, ok),
  470:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  471:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  472: 
  473: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  474: active_error_disallowed_client_renegotiate() ->
  475:     [{doc,"Test that an active client socket gets an error when server denies client renegotiation."}].
  476: active_error_disallowed_client_renegotiate(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  477:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  478:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  479: 
  480:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  481: 
  482:     Server =
  483: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  484: 				   {from, self()},
  485: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  486: 				   {options, [{client_renegotiation, false} | ServerOpts]}]),
  487:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  488: 
  489:     {ok, Client} = ssl:connect(Hostname, Port, [{renegotiate_at, 1}, {active, true} | ClientOpts]),
  490: 
  491:     {error, closed} = ssl:send(Client, crypto:strong_rand_bytes(20)),
  492: 
  493:     receive
  494:         {ssl_error, Client, _} ->
  495:             ok
  496:     end.
  497: 
  498: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  499: %% Internal functions ------------------------------------------------
  500: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  501: renegotiate(Socket, Data) ->
  502:     ?CT_LOG("Renegotiating ~n", []),
  503:     Result = ssl:renegotiate(Socket),
  504:     ?CT_LOG("Result ~p~n", [Result]),
  505:     ssl:send(Socket, Data),
  506:     case Result of
  507: 	ok ->
  508: 	    ok;
  509: 	Other ->
  510: 	    Other
  511:     end.
  512: 
  513: renegotiate_reuse_session(Socket, Data) ->
  514:     %% Make sure session is registered
  515:     ct:sleep(?SLEEP),
  516:     renegotiate(Socket, Data).
  517: 
  518: renegotiate_immediately(Socket) ->
  519:     _ = ssl_test_lib:active_recv(Socket, 11),
  520:     ok = ssl:renegotiate(Socket),  
  521:     {error, renegotiation_rejected} = ssl:renegotiate(Socket),
  522:     ct:sleep(?RENEGOTIATION_DISABLE_TIME + ?SLEEP),
  523:     ok = ssl:renegotiate(Socket),
  524:     ?CT_LOG("Renegotiated again"),
  525:     ssl:send(Socket, "Hello world"),
  526:     ok.
  527: 
  528: renegotiate_rejected(Socket) ->
  529:     _ = ssl_test_lib:active_recv(Socket, 11),
  530:     {error, renegotiation_rejected} = ssl:renegotiate(Socket),
  531:     {error, renegotiation_rejected} = ssl:renegotiate(Socket),
  532:     ct:sleep(?RENEGOTIATION_DISABLE_TIME +1),
  533:     {error, renegotiation_rejected} = ssl:renegotiate(Socket),
  534:     ?CT_LOG("Failed to renegotiate again"),
  535:     ssl:send(Socket, "Hello world"),
  536:     ok.
  537: 
  538: %% First two clauses handles 1/n-1 splitting countermeasure Rizzo/Duong-Beast
  539: treashold(N, ?TLS_1_0) ->
  540:     (N div 2) + 1;
  541: treashold(N, _) ->
  542:     N + 1.
  543: 
  544: erlang_ssl_receive(Socket, Data) ->
  545:     case ssl_test_lib:active_recv(Socket, length(Data)) of
  546:         Data ->
  547:             ok;
  548:         Other ->
  549:             ct:fail({{expected, Data}, {got, Other}})
  550:     end.
